comment: Giant eagle says only staurday Sunday and monday for 412 food rescue.   They said remove them from other days.
old_instruction: Please enter the 412 Food Rescue PIN into scanner: 65428. Please do not share the PIN # with staff--it is our electronic signature! . Please call store when you're on your way to confirm donation. Ask for Bakery to confirm a donation.
new_instruction: Please enter the 412 Food Rescue PIN into scanner: 65428. Please do not share the PIN # with staff--it is our electronic signature! . Please call store when you're on your way to confirm donation. Ask for Bakery to confirm a donation. Only available for pickup on Saturday, Sunday, and Monday.

comment:
No Bakery today, due to no staff in Bakery department. We should try to split Wednesday's rescue and give them some bakery. 

Also, Greg (formerly of GE CityView) is temporary Produce Mgr here. Need to change instructions to call him 30 minutes in advance of arrival to get donation ready.
old_instruction: Please call the Produce and Bakery Dept. to check for a donation before leaving. Park in the back of the building, and enter at the Receiving area. Buzz in at the call box.. *CHECK QUALITY OF PRODUCE & REFUSE BAD. Ask staff for Food Rescue donations & have them direct you to Produce cooler & Bakery Dept. Input PIN: 23020 in device upon request. If you receive baked goods, ask for boxes if not in boxes & use shopping cart to load your vehicle.
new_instruction: Please call Greg (formerly of GE CityView) 30 minutes in advance to get donation ready. Park in the back of the building, and enter at the Receiving area. Buzz in at the call box.. *CHECK QUALITY OF PRODUCE & REFUSE BAD. Ask staff for Food Rescue donations & have them direct you to Produce cooler & Bakery Dept. Input PIN: 23020 in device upon request. If you receive baked goods, ask for boxes if not in boxes & use shopping cart to load your vehicle.

comment: Was told donations cant be picked up till after 2:00.
old_instruction: Enter through front of store.  Notify staff that you are picking up a Food Rescue donation.  . Call ahead asking if there is a Food Rescue donation available.  Located in the Pavilion Shopping Center near Giant Eagle Beachwood. The doors lock at 2pm. Please ensure that you arrive between 1:45pm to 2pm.
new_instruction: Enter through front of store.  Notify staff that you are picking up a Food Rescue donation.  . Call ahead asking if there is a Food Rescue donation available.  Located in the Pavilion Shopping Center near Giant Eagle Beachwood. The doors lock at 2pm. Please ensure that you arrive between 1:45pm to 2pm. Pickup time for donations is after 2:00.

Pull up to the front door at the third Green Awning over the front door.  RIng doorbell.. Pull up to the front door at the third Green Awning (see pic).  A doorball has been installed at the front door, ring the doorbell when you arrive.  Please wear a mask when completing this rescue.
new_instruction: Look for the blue sign at 469 Albion Dr. Do not enter driveway @ sign that says 495 Albion, that is the wrong location. Please wear a mask when completing this rescue. Blue sign now present next to the door.

comment:
Well, this was my first delivery to Cincinnati Union Bethel (CUB - Scholar House) and after a bit of an adventure, I found them and got the donation delivered.

Our app (and my own GOOGLE MAPS app) unerringly led me to 929 E. McMillan, but that address is for an art gallery. Our app's final delivery guidance note advised me to look for the destination around the side of the building, directly across from a CVS pharmacy.

Well, the day care center isn't around the corner from the art gallery, and there's no CVS pharmacy anywhere I could find, but a helpful lady at a side door of the building advised that the day care center is at the back of the building (just about directly opposite the art gallery) and she knew our contact and was able to guide me there. I was introduced to Laneisha there and she knew our contact (who had left well before I arrived) and she accepted the donation and signed off for it.

So 'All's Well That Ends Well' and so ends another minor Last Mile Food Rescue adventure!
old_instruction: Across the street from CVS. Main entry on side of the building. If you park on McMillan, go to the side and ring doorbell.. Across the street from CVS. Main entry on side of the building. If you park on McMillan, go to the side and ring doorbell.
new_instruction: Across the street from CVS. Main entry on side of the building. If you park on McMillan, go to the side and ring doorbell. Updated Instruction: The recipient location is at the back of the building, directly opposite the art gallery at 929 E. McMillan. Look for a side door and seek assistance if needed to find Laneisha for donation handover.

comment:
Directions to drop off point could be improved. 
No one was available for pick up. But, I was able to reach Ernest and we agreed that I should leave the package by the door. It is not appear to be temperature sensitive, so that’s what I did. Thanks.
old_instruction: Park in back of building on Oakford Street. There will be an open garage door where staff will hand off donations. Call when you arrive.. Call or text to confirm there are donations for Philly Food Rescue and let them know you're on your way. Do not park in parking lot on Wharton St. You will go use back entrance on Oakford St (GPS mapping is updated)
new_instruction: Park in back of building on Oakford Street. There will be an open garage door where staff will hand off donations. Call when you arrive.. Call or text to confirm there are donations for Philly Food Rescue and let them know you're on your way. Do not park in parking lot on Wharton St. You will go use back entrance on Oakford St (GPS mapping is updated). If in doubt, reach out to Ernest.

comment: Neither contacts answered their phones so I walked in.  Pamela said she’s never at her desk so asked thay I just walk in or, if the doors are closed, ring the doorbell to the right of the doors, fyi, in case you’d like to update the notes for this location.
old_instruction: Enter through the open doors and advise staff there that you have a donation for drop off. They will help with unloading. For any issues, please call Pamela (ext. 214). If unavailable, call Joey: 604-324-6212 ext 210. Drive down Alberta Street to the parking lot behind the YMCA building. Park as close as you can to the set of red double doors with the Food Hub banner above it. For any issues, please call Pamela (ext. 214). If unavailable, call Joey: 604-324-6212 ext 210
new_instruction: Enter through the open doors and advise staff there that you have a donation for drop off. They will help with unloading. For any issues, please call Pamela (ext. 214). If unavailable, call Joey: 604-324-6212 ext 210. Drive down Alberta Street to the parking lot behind the YMCA building. Park as close as you can to the set of red double doors with the Food Hub banner above it. For any issues, please call Pamela (ext. 214). If unavailable, call Joey: 604-324-6212 ext 210. Contact Pamela; if unavailable call Joey: 604-324-6212 ext 210. Ring the doorbell to the right of the doors in case contacts are unresponsive.

comment:
1. Need to add Contact information for Crumbl Cookies in instructions to be able to call ahead and confirm donation available before showing up.
2. The door bell on the rear entrance of Serenity Hall is currently out of order; therefore need to call them to have someone come and open the door.
old_instruction: Pull in front of building or to the back parking lot behind the building, depending on where they would like it delivered. (Call Staff if you haven't already). Call with your ETA when leaving the donor. Ask if they would like the delivery to be in front or at the back door.
new_instruction: Pull in front of building or to the back parking lot behind the building, depending on where they would like it delivered. (Call Staff if you haven't already). Call with your ETA when leaving the donor. Ask if they would like the delivery to be in front or at the back door. Call Talbert House if the doorbell on the rear entrance of Serenity Hall is out of order.
